Who We Are

With a foundation in the banking industry and Wall Street, our founders saw firsthand how small businesses struggled to access funding through traditional financial channels. This inspired them to establish Shore Funding Solutions in 2014, with a small but dedicated team based in Melville, NY. From these modest beginnings, we’ve grown to a team of 80 professionals. Along the way, we’ve facilitated over $1 billion in funding, and our dedication to empowering businesses with financial solutions remains at the core of our continued success.

Our Story

With a foundation in the banking industry and Wall Street, our founders saw firsthand how small businesses struggled to access funding through traditional financial channels. This inspired them to establish Shore Funding Solutions in 2014, with a small but dedicated team based in Melville, NY. From these modest beginnings, we’ve grown to a team of 80 professionals. Along the way, we’ve facilitated over $1 billion in funding, and our dedication to empowering businesses with financial solutions remains at the core of our continued success.

Our Mission

Funding Force, we are dedicated to supporting small businesses by providing the necessary funding for their success. We take pride in our values of transparency, fairness, and integrity, ensuring that every interaction is conducted with these principles in mind. We are committed to guiding our clients through the complexities of financing options with professionalism and compassion. Our priority lies in exceptional customer service, approaching each transaction with the same level of care and attention as we would for our own business. By fostering strong, transparent relationships, we work tirelessly to secure the best rates and terms for our clients.

Area we serve:

As a national ISO with a vast network of lender relationships, we proudly serve clients throughout the United States and Canada. Our services cater to businesses across all industries and locations, ensuring that we can assist a diverse range of companies in achieving their financial goals.
